title: Was Joel Right?
description:
Greg thinks Joel was wrong but he chose to save Chloe. Make it make sense! 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lvFmAoIq4wk

Pre-order New World: Aeternum now on PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S to get the Azoth Stalker Wolf Mount and prepare for launch on October 15! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
